Contradict fact: The claim may contradict the fact that there was a terrorist attack on a police station in Shopian district of Jammu and Kashmir. The senior police official of the Shopian district called it "fake news."
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as no media reports had emerged about such an incident in Shopian district up until that point.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that there was a terrorist attack on a police station in Shopian district based on the statement issued by J&K BJP, but it may be a misinterpretation or mistake.
Exist alternative explanation: The senior police official of the Shopian district called the claim "fake news," suggesting that there may be an alternative explanation for the reported incident.
